name: Robot War - New World
description:
Robot War - New World is war in the city and the whole organization of evil world wants to fix the city through their robot war games. It is not a traditional battle as the rebellious populaces are using prophesied machinery of army robot war fighting, US army war games and robot transformation battleground for transform battle.
Features:
- Real Robot War Battleground
- Heavy metal Gunner Robot
- Deadliest missions
- wide range of Weapons
- Battlefield Adventures
- Smooth controls
- Incredible Monsters
- Realistic Graphics
